td.content: s:a 65 yo white f describes recurrent Kidney over the past month. she denies smoking she drinks alcohol occasionally o:Height 169 cm, Weight 78.6 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15 a:Chronic Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Lisinopril - 20 mg daily, and ordered Basic Metabolic Panel, Urinalysis.
